headline: Oil Rig Count Rises by 5; Crude Futures Headed for Weekly Losses
summary: The number of oil rigs in the US increased by five between Nov. 27 and Dec. 6, according to data com

headline: U.S. Oil Rig Count Rises Despite Falling Crude Prices
summary: U.S. oil rig count rises while crude prices fall and production reaches a record high, signaling mixed trends in the energy market.

headline: 3 Top Value Stocks to Buy in December
summary: Trading at 12.4 times Wall Street analyst estimates for 2025, roofing, insulation, and doors company Owens Corning (NYSE: OC) is attractively valued and has upside potential coming from a recovery in the housing market.  In addition, the company has earnings growth potential from delivering on its target of $125 million in synergies from the acquisition of doors and door system company Masonite in 2023.  If the housing market recovers, it will be much easier to generate synergies from the deal, not least as doors, shingles, and insulation are sold to the same customers.
